doctor.name: Dr. Najma Mahboob
doctor.info: Dr. Najma Mahboob is a General Surgeon in Chittagong. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery). She is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Najma Mahboob at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong is 6.30pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday & Saturday).

doctor.name: Dr. Sayed Md. Samser Nahid
doctor.specialty: Colorectal (Piles, Fistula, Colon, Rectum) Surgery Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Sayed Md. Samser Nahid is a Colorectal Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), FCPS (Surgery), FASCRS (USA). He is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Dr. Sayed Md. Samser Nahid at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong is 6pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
